numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some people play games.
2. Some games play people.
3. In some sports, colored people make up a significant portion of teams.
4. In these sports, Caucasians are mostly coaches.
5. There is not much diversity in coaching in these sports.
6. I ask why there is not diversity in the spectrum of sports.
7. I ask whether money is a reason for this situation.
8. I ask whether racial bias is a reason for this situation.
9. Some people say that African Americans are gifted in sports.
10. I ask whether some people bid on African Americans in sports.
11. I ask whether some people play African Americans like puppets behind the scenes.
12. Some people run everything in the sport industry.
13. Some of these people are whites in power.
14. This situation has a strong impact on African Americans.
15. Some African Americans aspire to be iconic in sports.
16. If a person aspires to be iconic in sports then the person should execute a process to achieve that dream.
17. I want people to know the real game behind the scenes.
18. I think that racial statistics can help to prove my stance.
19. This situation does not affect other people much.
20. This situation can affect a person who is obsessed with sports.
21. This situation can affect a person who believes that everything needs to be diverse.
